title: Plate made for William Beckford
artistDisplayName:
Sèvres Porcelain Manufactory
French, founded 1740
Painted by Jean-Baptiste Tandart (French, active 1754–1803) and Etienne-Henry Le Guay (French, active 1748–49, 1751–96)
medium: Soft-paste porcelain, polychrome enamels, and gilding
creditLine: Art Institute of Chicago. Joseph Maier and Arthur Lewis Liebman Memorial: Gift of Kenneth J. Maier, M.D.
